name: Growing Pains (itch) (Kialli)
description:
You get lost in the woods and find a monument, what adventures does this forest hold??? Find all the rings and bring them back to get clear the fog!

Horror game about adventure and growing a tree to save the day(literally)

I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE GAME AS WEBGL BREAKS THE PIXEL ART AND DITHERING SHADER

PC:

WASD: movement

SHIFT: run

E: interact
